Text: Freud: A Life for Our Time is a 1988 biography of Sigmund Freud, the founder of psychoanalysis, by the historian Peter Gay.

Text: Freud: A Life for Our Time:  The work is based partly on new material that has become available since the publication of Ernest Jones' "The Life and Work of Sigmund Freud" (1953).

<Text: Freud: A Life for Our Time:  The book has been praised, but has also been criticized by several authors skeptical of psychoanalysis.>
